content: In the 436th LeetCode Weekly Contest, nine out of the top ten participants are from China, with only one participant (9th place, uwi, from Japan) from another country. I can only imagine how desperate foreign coders must feel, lol. Now I understand why so many brilliant scientists and engineers are leaving this countryâ€”itâ€™s simply too competitive.
